00058 void MAsymRoot::SaveAs(string pattern, string dir)
00059 {
00060    TCanvas canvas("canvas", "canvas", 1400, 600);
00061    canvas.UseCurrentStyle();
00062 
00063    stringstream ssSignature("signature not defined");
00064 
00065    char strAnaTime[25];
00066    time_t currentTime = time(0);
00067    tm *ltime = localtime( &currentTime );
00068    strftime(strAnaTime, 25, "%c", ltime);
00069 
00070    ssSignature << "Fills " << fMinFill << "--" << fMaxFill << ", Analyzed " << strAnaTime;
00071    ssSignature << ", Version " << fAnaInfo->fAsymVersion << ", " << fAnaInfo->fUserGroup.fUser;
00072 
00073    fHists->SetSignature(ssSignature.str());
00074    fHists->SaveAllAs(DrawObjContainer::FORMAT_PNG, canvas, pattern, dir);
00075 }

00079 void MAsymRoot::UpdMinMax(EventConfig &mm)

00087 void MAsymRoot::UpdMinMaxFill(UInt_t fillId)
00088 {
00089    if (fillId < fMinFill ) fMinFill = fillId;
00090    if (fillId > fMaxFill ) fMaxFill = fillId;
00091 }
00092

00095 void MAsymRoot::UpdMinMaxTime(time_t time)
00096 {
00097    if (time < fMinTime ) fMinTime = time;
00098    if (time > fMaxTime ) fMaxTime = time;
00099 }

00111 void MAsymRoot::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00112 {
00113    fprintf(f, "<?php\n");
00114 
00115    fprintf(f, "\n// AnaGlobResult data\n");
00116    if (!fAnaGlobResult) {
00117       Error("PrintAsPhp", "fAnaGlobResult not defined");
00118    } else {
00119       fAnaGlobResult->PrintAsPhp(f);
00120    }
00121 
00122    fprintf(f, "?>\n");
